#How to generate the java libsndfile wrapper for windows7, JDK1.7 x64

= Introduction =
How to generate the java libsndfile wrapper for windows7, JDK1.7 x64 (text also included in swig/README.txt)

= Details =

Prereqs:
 # 64bit java installation.
 # Ensure you are using it - check Windows/System32 and Windows/SysWOW64  for java.exe, javaw.exe (etc) files.  If they exist, nuke 'em. 
 # Cygwin with full development tools installed.
 # Swig - http://www.swig.org/
 # libsndfile 64 bit installation.

How was this wrapper generated?
Run the generate_dlls.sh script.

= Notes =
 # Currently using v1.0.25 (2011-07-23) of libsndfile (swig/LIBSNDFILE_VERSION.txt)
 # sndfile.h, sndfile.hh were taken from LIBSNDFILE_INSTALL_DIR/include
 # libsndfile-1.dll was taken from LIBSNDFILE_INSTALL_DIR/bin
